original: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;

original: Bhikkhunī jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicchādeti, āpatti pārājikassa;

original: Yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
analyzed: yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā kati āpattiyaḥ āpajjati

original: Yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
analyzed: yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā pañca āpattiyaḥ āpajjati

original: Ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ;
analyzed: ukkhitta anuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati ñattiyā dukkaṭa
dvīhi kamma vācāhi thullaccayā

original: bhedakānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
analyzed: bhedaka anuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjati āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa

original: Aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?

original: aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

original: Samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāraṇapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

original: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
analyzed: avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisa puggalassa hatthato khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjana paccayā tissaḥ āpattiyaḥ āpajjati

original: “Kiṁ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṁ anavassutā.

original: Iṅgha, ayye, yaṁ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā taṁ tvaṁ sahatthā

original: paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti, uyyojanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
